{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=Streaming Stick |revision=(3400R) |upc=829610880341 |ean= |asin=B009CL6DUE;US; |price=99 |est_release_date=10/2012 |fcc_date=09/24/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=computer-on-a-stick, media streamer |fcc_id=TC2-R1005 |ic_id=5959A-R1005 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=MHL-11 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG2S3ETA00 |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4P2G324EC-AGC1 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1208 P21, 187476 6 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI, MHL-11 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Streaming Media Player''' :[http://www.roku.com/streamingstick Product page] :Retailed for $99
The FCC documents list the following models.. *3400 (Purple color) *3420 (White color) *3400X (Device in sample label)
Per the FCC test report, the antenna is manufactured by '''Cortec Technology'''.
*[http://techcrunch.com/2012/01/04/rokus-streaming-stick-makes-your-dumb-tv-much-smarter/ Rokuâ€™s Streaming Stick Makes Your Dumb TV Much Smarter - TechCrunch]
This device uses the [[Roku RC04]] Wi-Fi Direct remote.
